name: saveBestRepresentation(for:to:contentType:completion:)
desc: Saves the best representation of thumbnail for a specific request to the specified URL.
declaration:
func saveBestRepresentation(for request: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request, 
                         to fileURL: URL, 
                contentType: String, 
                 completion completionHandler: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)
